title: How to read the framework results
description: Every metric is a score from 0-10. A score of 10 means the ministry/agency is doing as well as can be expected based on best practice and the organisation's nature.

results.title: Strategy Results
results.description: Assesses any written expression of strategic intent relating to digital communications the organisation has, even if it is not explicitly labelled "digital strategy". This is based on the opinion that a digital strategy should be documented for concreteness and transferability of knowledge. Declaring a strategy is the groundwork for carrying out digital communications in a sustained manner.

results.title: Social Media Results
results.description: Looks at elements of digital strategy that apply to the organisation's social media engagement.

results.title: Web results
results.description: Looks at elements of digital strategy that apply to the organisation's website(s).
